snippet: A Republican-backed measure that will repeal Indiana’s law setting wages for state and local government construction projects has been approved by Gov. Mike Pence.
abstract: Indiana Gov Mike Pence approves Republican-backed measure that would repeal law setting wages for state and local government construction projects.
lead_paragraph: A Republican-backed measure that will repeal Indiana’s law setting wages for state and local government construction projects has been approved by Gov. Mike Pence.

headline.main: Indiana: Law Enacted to Lower Construction Wages
headline.print_headline: Indiana: Law Enacted to Lower Construction Wages
